Dialogues.Text: So you're the runt who's gonna be helping me tonight? Great... You at least know how to do a backstitch, right? I swear all these newbies the Orator gives me are utterly incompetent.

You don't even know what you're doing here...? Juuuuust great... I guess I'll just have to give you the run down. You're gonna be helping me make some more uniforms. Y'know... robes, hoods, masks... all the good stuff! I'll assign you a specific piece of clothing and give you the materials to make it. All the work stations you'll need to do that are all right here. Once you're done, you bring it back to me, and I give you another. So on and so forth until we've met our quota for the night. Got it?
Perfect. Then lemme know when you're ready!
